More Notes: A 1% increase in flood-exposed area increases GSDP by 1.14%, mainly because industrial and service facilities are often located near surface water resources. The analysis uses data from 2001-2015, and 2015 is the latest year considered.

A 1% increase in drought-exposed area increases drought-exposed GSDP by 1.02%, even though the total area exposed decreased. The analysis uses data from 2001-2015, and 2015 is the latest year considered.
